title: Getting S while getting mastery lvl5 does NOT give tokens?
body: Is this fair? I'm not saying getting an S or leveling up champions is hard, but I think players deserve mastery level6 tokens if they get S when the champ just got to level 5. I'm sure that leveling up champions would be hard for some players (like one of my friends is struggling to get lvl6 Anivia) and they probably don't wanna miss out any chances to get a token. Just wanna see how people react to this :)
